name: Field Dressing
Lore: 'The Alliance lost many fine soldiers at conflicts such as the Battle of Hoth. The Rebel High Command is aware of the cost of freedom from Imperial tyranny.',
Text: 'If you just forfeited a character of ability < 5 present at a site, deploy on that character (who remains at same site and, if ''hit,'' is restored to normal).  Character is forfeit = 0 (even if forfeit may not normally be reduced).  May play First Aid to place this card in Used Pile.  Immune to your Control.',
